note:
Hi, I'm TRIAC, 32, engineering Ph.D. and double dad (he), in Munich, South Germany. I've been doing Chiptune music on Nintendo gameboys running nanoloop for 12 years and lately also with synthesizers, with questionable success. Check my bandcamp for music!

Also active in outdoor sports, mostly climbing & bouldering on plastic and real rocks, also running, hiking, cycling.

Employed as research coordinator at a big research association.

Also shitposting and memes. Lately mostly that.
